mapper.update: update mkt_question_detail set QUESTION_ID = #{questionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QST_DETAIL_ORDER = #{qstDetailOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QST_DETAIL_VALUE = #{qstDetailValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QST_DETAIL_INPUT_TYPE = #{qstDetailInputType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where QST_DETAIL_ID = #{qstDetailId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select QST_DETAIL_ID, QUESTION_ID, QST_DETAIL_ORDER, QST_DETAIL_VALUE, QST_DETAIL_INPUT_TYPE, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_question_detail where QST_DETAIL_ID = #{qstDetailId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select QST_DETAIL_ID, QUESTION_ID, QST_DETAIL_ORDER, QST_DETAIL_VALUE, QST_DETAIL_INPUT_TYPE, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_question_detail

select QST_DETAIL_ID, QUESTION_ID, QST_DETAIL_ORDER, QST_DETAIL_VALUE, QST_DETAIL_INPUT_TYPE, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_question_detail where QUESTION_ID = #{quesitonId}
